016package org.lifstools.jgoslin.cli;
017
018import java.io.BufferedWriter;
019import java.io.File;
020import java.io.IOException;
021import java.io.StringWriter;
022import java.nio.file.Files;
023import java.time.Instant;
024import java.util.ArrayList;
025import java.util.Arrays;
026import java.util.Collections;
027import java.util.HashSet;
028import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
029import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
030import java.util.LinkedList;
031import java.util.List;
032import java.util.Locale;
033import java.util.Map;
034import java.util.Objects;
035import java.util.Optional;
036import java.util.Properties;
037import java.util.regex.Matcher;
038import java.util.regex.Pattern;
039import java.util.stream.Collectors;
040import java.util.stream.Stream;
041import org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine;
042import org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLineParser;
043import org.apache.commons.cli.HelpFormatter;
044import org.apache.commons.cli.Options;
045import org.apache.commons.cli.PosixParser;
046import org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair;
047import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.ConstraintViolationException;
048import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.FattyAcid;
049import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.FunctionalGroup;
050import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.KnownFunctionalGroups;
051import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.LipidAdduct;
052import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.LipidClassMeta;
053import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.LipidClasses;
054import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.LipidException;
055import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.LipidLevel;
056import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.LipidSpeciesInfo;
057import org.lifstools.jgoslin.parser.BaseParserEventHandler;
058import org.lifstools.jgoslin.parser.FattyAcidParser;
059import org.lifstools.jgoslin.parser.GoslinParser;
060import org.lifstools.jgoslin.parser.HmdbParser;
061import org.lifstools.jgoslin.parser.LipidMapsParser;
062import org.lifstools.jgoslin.parser.Parser;
063import org.lifstools.jgoslin.parser.ShorthandParser;
064import org.lifstools.jgoslin.parser.SwissLipidsParser;
065import org.slf4j.Logger;
066import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

068/**
069 * Create a new command line parser for parsing of lipid names.
070 *
071 * @author Dominik Kopczynski
072 * @author Nils Hoffmann
073 *
074 */
075public class CmdLineParser {
076
077    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(CmdLineParser.class);
078
079    public static final String LIPIDMAPS_CLASS_REGEXP = ".+\\[([A-Z0-9]+)\\]";
080    private static final LipidClasses LIPID_CLASSES = LipidClasses.getInstance();
081    
082    private static final Map<Grammar, Parser<LipidAdduct>> parsers = new LinkedHashMap<>();
083
084    private static String getAppInfo() throws IOException {
085        Properties p = new Properties();
086        p.load(CmdLineParser.class.getResourceAsStream(
087                "/application.properties"));
088        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
089        String buildDate = p.getProperty("app.build.date", "no build date");
090        if (!"no build date".equals(buildDate)) {
091            Instant instant = Instant.ofEpochMilli(Long.parseLong(buildDate));
092            buildDate = instant.toString();
093        }
094        /*
095         *Property keys are in src/main/resources/application.properties
096         */
097        sb.append("Running ").
098                append(p.getProperty("app.name", "undefined app")).
099                append("\n\r").
100                append(" version: '").
101                append(p.getProperty("app.version", "unknown version")).
102                append("'").
103                append("\n\r").
104                append(" build-date: '").
105                append(buildDate).
106                append("'").
107                append("\n\r").
108                append(" scm-location: '").
109                append(p.getProperty("scm.location", "no scm location")).
110                append("'").
111                append("\n\r").
112                append(" commit: '").
113                append(p.getProperty("scm.commit.id", "no commit id")).
114                append("'").
115                append("\n\r").
116                append(" branch: '").
117                append(p.getProperty("scm.branch", "no branch")).
118                append("'").
119                append("\n\r");
120        return sb.toString();
121    }
122
123    /**
124     * <p>
125     * Runs the command line parser for jgoslin, including validation.</p>
126     *
127     * Run with the {@code -h} or {@code --help} option to see more options.
128     *
129     * @param args an array of {@link java.lang.String} lipid names.
130     * @throws java.lang.Exception if any unexpected errors occur.
131     */
132    @SuppressWarnings("static-access")
133    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
134        CommandLineParser parser = new PosixParser();
135        Options options = new Options();
136        String helpOpt = addHelpOption(options);
137        String versionOpt = addVersionOption(options);
138        String lipidNameOpt = addLipidNameInputOption(options);
139        String lipidFileOpt = addLipidFileInputOption(options);
140        String outputToFileOpt = addOutputToFileOption(options);
141        String grammarOpt = addGrammarOption(options);
142
143        CommandLine line = parser.parse(options, args);
144        if (line.getOptions().length == 0 || line.hasOption(helpOpt)) {
145            HelpFormatter formatter = new HelpFormatter();
146            formatter.printHelp("jgoslin-cli", options);
147        } else if (line.hasOption(versionOpt)) {
148            log.info(getAppInfo());
149        } else {
150            boolean toFile = false;
151            if (line.hasOption(outputToFileOpt)) {
152                toFile = true;
153            }
154            Stream<String> lipidNames = Stream.empty();
155            if (line.hasOption(lipidNameOpt)) {
156                lipidNames = Stream.of(line.getOptionValues(lipidNameOpt));
157            } else if (line.hasOption(lipidFileOpt)) {
158                lipidNames = Files.lines(new File(line.getOptionValue(lipidFileOpt)).toPath()).filter((t) -> {
159                    return !t.isEmpty();
160                });
161            }
162            List<Pair<String, List<ValidationResult>>> results = Collections.emptyList();
163            if (line.hasOption(grammarOpt)) {
164                results = parseNamesWith(lipidNames, Grammar.valueOf(line.getOptionValue(grammarOpt)));
165            } else {
166                results = parseNames(lipidNames);
167            }
168            if (results.isEmpty()) {
169                log.info("No results generated. Please check input file or lipid names passed on the cli!");
170                System.exit(1);
171            }
172            if (toFile) {
173                log.debug("Saving output to 'goslin-out.tsv'.");
174                boolean successful = writeToFile(new File("goslin-out.tsv"), results);
175                if (!successful) {
176                    System.exit(1);
177                }
178            } else {
179                log.debug("Echoing output to stdout.");
180                boolean successful = writeToStdOut(results);
181                if (!successful) {
182                    System.exit(1);
183                }
184            }
185        }
186    }
187
188    private static enum Grammar {
189        GOSLIN, GOSLIN_FRAGMENTS, LIPIDMAPS, SWISSLIPIDS, HMDB, SHORTHAND2020, FATTY_ACID, NONE
190    };
191
192    record ValidationResult(
193            String lipidName,
194            Grammar grammar,
195            LipidLevel level,
196            List<String> messages,
197            LipidAdduct lipidAdduct,
198            LipidSpeciesInfo lipidSpeciesInfo,
199            String canonicalName,
200            String lipidMapsCategory,
201            String lipidMapsClass,
202            List<FattyAcid> fattyAcids) {
203
204        public ValidationResult          {
205            Objects.requireNonNull(messages);
206            Objects.requireNonNull(fattyAcids);
207        }
208    }
209
210    private static boolean writeToStdOut(List<Pair<String, List<ValidationResult>>> results) {
211
212        try (StringWriter sw = new StringWriter()) {
213            try (BufferedWriter bw = new BufferedWriter(sw)) {
214                writeToWriter(bw, results);
215            }
216            sw.flush();
217            sw.close();
218            log.info(sw.toString());
219            return true;
220        } catch (IOException ex) {
221            log.error("Caught exception while trying to write validation results string!", ex);
222            return false;
223        }
224    }
225
226    private static boolean writeToFile(File f, List<Pair<String, List<ValidationResult>>> results) {
227
228        try (BufferedWriter bw = Files.newBufferedWriter(f.toPath())) {
229            writeToWriter(bw, results);
230            return true;
231        } catch (IOException ex) {
232            log.error("Caught exception while trying to write validation results to file " + f, ex);
233            return false;
234        }
235    }
236
237    private static String toTable(List<Pair<String, List<ValidationResult>>> results) {
238        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
239        HashSet<String> keys = new LinkedHashSet<>();
240        List<ValidationResult> validationResults = results.stream().map((t) -> {
241            return t.getValue();
242        }).flatMap(List::stream).toList();
243        List<Map<String, String>> entries = validationResults.stream().map((t) -> {
244            Map<String, String> m = new LinkedHashMap<>();
245            m.put("Normalized Name", Optional.ofNullable(t.canonicalName).orElse(""));
246            m.put("Original Name", t.lipidName);
247            m.put("Grammar", t.grammar.name());
248            m.put("Message", t.messages.stream().collect(Collectors.joining(" | ")));
249            if (t.lipidAdduct != null) {
250                m.put("Adduct", t.lipidAdduct.getAdduct() == null ? "" : t.lipidAdduct.getAdduct().getLipidString());
251                m.put("Sum Formula", t.lipidAdduct.getSumFormula());
252                m.put("Mass", String.format(Locale.US, "%.4f", t.lipidAdduct.getMass()));
253                m.put("Lipid Maps Category", t.lipidAdduct.getLipid().getHeadGroup().getLipidCategory().getFullName() + " [" + t.lipidAdduct.getLipid().getHeadGroup().getLipidCategory().name() + "]");
254                LipidClassMeta lclass = LIPID_CLASSES.get(t.lipidAdduct.getLipid().getInfo().lipidClass);
255                m.put("Lipid Maps Main Class", lclass.description);
256                String lclassAbbr = getLipidMapsClassAbbreviation(lclass.description);
257                m.put("Functional Class Abbr", "[" + lclassAbbr + "]");
258                m.put("Functional Class Synonyms", "[" + lclass.synonyms.stream().collect(Collectors.joining(", ")) + "]");
259                m.put("Level", t.level.name());
260                m.put("Total #C", t.lipidSpeciesInfo.getNumCarbon() + "");
261                m.put("Total #DB", t.lipidSpeciesInfo.getDoubleBonds().getNumDoubleBonds() + "");
262                Map<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> functionalGroups = t.lipidSpeciesInfo.getFunctionalGroups();
263                for (String functionalGroupKey : functionalGroups.keySet()) {
264                    ArrayList<FunctionalGroup> fg = functionalGroups.get(functionalGroupKey);
265                    String fgCounts = fg.stream().map((sfg) -> {
266                        return "" + sfg.getCount();
267                    }).collect(Collectors.joining("|"));
268                    m.put("Total #" + functionalGroupKey, fgCounts);
269                }
270                for (FattyAcid fa : t.fattyAcids()) {
271                    String faName = fa.getName();
272                    m.put(faName + " SN Position", fa.getPosition() + "");
273                    m.put(faName + " #C", fa.getNumCarbon() + "");
274                    m.put(faName + " #DB", fa.getDoubleBonds().getNumDoubleBonds() + "");
275                    m.put(faName + " Bond Type", fa.getLipidFaBondType().name() + "");
276                    String dbPositions = fa.getDoubleBonds().getDoubleBondPositions().entrySet().stream().map((entry) -> {
277                        return entry.getKey() + "" + entry.getValue();
278                    }).collect(Collectors.joining("|"));
279                    m.put(faName + " DB Positions", dbPositions + "");
280                    for (String functionalGroupKey : fa.getFunctionalGroups().keySet()) {
281                        ArrayList<FunctionalGroup> fg = fa.getFunctionalGroups().get(functionalGroupKey);
282                        String fgCounts = fg.stream().map((sfg) -> {
283                            return "" + sfg.getCount();
284                        }).collect(Collectors.joining("|"));
285                        m.put("Total #" + functionalGroupKey, fgCounts);
286                    }
287                }
288            } else {
289                m.put("Lipid Maps Category", "");
290                m.put("Lipid Maps Main Class", "");
291                m.put("Functional Class Abbr", "");
292                m.put("Functional Class Synonyms", "");
293                m.put("Level", "");
294                m.put("Total #C", "");
295                m.put("Total #DB", "");
296            }
297            keys.addAll(m.keySet());
298            return m;
299        }).toList();
300        sb.append(keys.stream().collect(Collectors.joining("\t"))).append("\n");
301        for (Map<String, String> m : entries) {
302            List<String> l = new LinkedList();
303            for (String key : keys) {
304                l.add(m.getOrDefault(key, ""));
305            }
306            sb.append(l.stream().collect(Collectors.joining("\t"))).append("\n");
307        }
308        return sb.toString();
309    }
310
311    private static void writeToWriter(BufferedWriter bw, List<Pair<String, List<ValidationResult>>> results) {
312        try {
313            bw.write(toTable(results));
314            bw.newLine();
315        } catch (IOException ex) {
316            log.error("Caught exception while trying to write validation results to buffered writer.", ex);
317        }
318    }
319
320    private static List<Pair<String, List<ValidationResult>>> parseNames(Stream<String> lipidNames) {
321        return lipidNames.map((t) -> {
322            return parseName(t);
323        }).toList();
324    }
325
326    private static List<Pair<String, List<ValidationResult>>> parseNamesWith(Stream<String> lipidNames, Grammar grammar) {
327        return lipidNames.map((t) -> {
328            return parseNameWith(t, grammar);
329        }).toList().stream().map((t) -> {
330            return Pair.of(t.getKey(), Arrays.asList(t.getValue()));
331        }).toList();
332    }
333
334    private static Pair<String, ValidationResult> parseNameWith(String lipidName, Grammar grammar) {
335        Parser<LipidAdduct> parser = loadParsers().get(grammar);
336        if (parser == null) {
337            throw new ConstraintViolationException("Unsupported grammar: " + grammar);
338        }
339        ValidationResult validationResult;
340        try {
341            BaseParserEventHandler<LipidAdduct> handler = parser.newEventHandler();
342            LipidAdduct la = parser.parse(lipidName, handler, false);
343            if (la == null) {
344                validationResult = new ValidationResult(
345                        lipidName,
346                        grammar,
347                        LipidLevel.NO_LEVEL,
348                        Arrays.asList(handler.getErrorMessage()),
349                        null,
350                        null,
351                        null,
352                        null,
353                        null,
354                        Collections.emptyList()
355                );
356                log.debug("Could not parse " + lipidName + " with " + grammar + " grammar: " + grammar + ". Message: " + handler.getErrorMessage());
357                return Pair.of(lipidName, validationResult);
358            } else {
359                String canonicalName;
360                try {
361                    canonicalName = la.getLipidString();
362                } catch (RuntimeException re) {
363                    canonicalName = null;
364                    log.debug("Parsing error for {}!", lipidName);
365                }
366                List<FattyAcid> fas = extractFas(la);
367                validationResult = new ValidationResult(
368                        lipidName,
369                        grammar,
370                        la.getLipidLevel(),
371                        Arrays.asList(handler.getErrorMessage()),
372                        la,
373                        la.getLipid().getInfo(),
374                        canonicalName,
375                        LIPID_CLASSES.get(la.getLipid().getInfo().lipidClass).lipidCategory.name(),
376                        getLipidMapsClassAbbreviation(LIPID_CLASSES.get(la.getLipid().getInfo().lipidClass).lipidClassName),
377                        fas
378                );
379                return Pair.of(lipidName, validationResult);
380            }
381        } catch (LipidException ex) {
382            validationResult = new ValidationResult(
383                    lipidName,
384                    grammar,
385                    LipidLevel.NO_LEVEL,
386                    Arrays.asList("Parsing failed for lipid '" + lipidName + "' using grammar '" + grammar + "' with exception: " + ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
387                    null,
388                    null,
389                    null,
390                    null,
391                    null,
392                    Collections.emptyList()
393            );
394            log.error("Parsing failed for lipid '" + lipidName + "' using grammar '" + grammar + "' with exception: " + ex.getLocalizedMessage(), ex);
395            return Pair.of(lipidName, validationResult);
396        }
397    }
398
399    private static Pair<String, List<ValidationResult>> parseName(String lipidName) {
400        List<ValidationResult> results = new ArrayList<>();
401        Pair<String, ValidationResult> shorthandResult = parseNameWith(lipidName, Grammar.SHORTHAND2020);
402        if (shorthandResult.getValue().canonicalName != null) {
403            return Pair.of(shorthandResult.getKey(), Arrays.asList(shorthandResult.getValue()));
404        }
405        Pair<String, ValidationResult> fattyAcid = parseNameWith(lipidName, Grammar.FATTY_ACID);
406        if (fattyAcid.getValue().canonicalName != null) {
407            return Pair.of(fattyAcid.getKey(), Arrays.asList(fattyAcid.getValue()));
408        }
409        Pair<String, ValidationResult> goslinResult = parseNameWith(lipidName, Grammar.GOSLIN);
410        if (goslinResult.getValue().canonicalName != null) {
411            return Pair.of(goslinResult.getKey(), Arrays.asList(goslinResult.getValue()));
412        }
413        Pair<String, ValidationResult> lipidMapsResult = parseNameWith(lipidName, Grammar.LIPIDMAPS);
414        if (lipidMapsResult.getValue().canonicalName != null) {
415            return Pair.of(lipidMapsResult.getKey(), Arrays.asList(lipidMapsResult.getValue()));
416        }
417        Pair<String, ValidationResult> swissLipidsResult = parseNameWith(lipidName, Grammar.SWISSLIPIDS);
418        if (swissLipidsResult.getValue().canonicalName != null) {
419            return Pair.of(swissLipidsResult.getKey(), Arrays.asList(swissLipidsResult.getValue()));
420        }
421        Pair<String, ValidationResult> hmdbResult = parseNameWith(lipidName, Grammar.HMDB);
422        if (hmdbResult.getValue().canonicalName != null) {
423            return Pair.of(hmdbResult.getKey(), Arrays.asList(hmdbResult.getValue()));
424        }
425        List<String> messages = new ArrayList<>(hmdbResult.getValue().messages);
426        messages.add("Lipid name could not be parsed with any grammar!");
427        ValidationResult r = new ValidationResult(lipidName, Grammar.NONE, LipidLevel.NO_LEVEL, messages, null, null, "", null, null, Collections.emptyList());
428        results.add(r);
429        return Pair.of(lipidName, results);
430    }
431
432    private static ArrayList<FattyAcid> extractFas(LipidAdduct la) {
433        return la.getLipid().getFaList();
434    }
435
436    private static String getLipidMapsClassAbbreviation(String lipidMapsClass) {
437        Pattern lmcRegexp = Pattern.compile(LIPIDMAPS_CLASS_REGEXP);
438        Matcher lmcMatcher = lmcRegexp.matcher(lipidMapsClass);
439        if (lmcMatcher.matches() && lmcMatcher.groupCount() == 1) {
440            lipidMapsClass = lmcMatcher.group(1);
441        } else {
442            lipidMapsClass = null;
443        }
444        return lipidMapsClass;
445    }
446
447    protected static String addLipidFileInputOption(Options options) {
448        String versionOpt = "file";
449        options.addOption("f", versionOpt, true, "Input a file name to read from for lipid name for parsing. Each lipid name must be on a separate line.");
450        return versionOpt;
451    }
452
453    protected static String addLipidNameInputOption(Options options) {
454        String versionOpt = "name";
455        options.addOption("n", versionOpt, true, "Input a lipid name for parsing.");
456        return versionOpt;
457    }
458
459    protected static String addVersionOption(Options options) {
460        String versionOpt = "version";
461        options.addOption("v", versionOpt, false, "Print version information.");
462        return versionOpt;
463    }
464
465    protected static String addHelpOption(Options options) {
466        String helpOpt = "help";
467        options.addOption("h", helpOpt, false, "Print help message.");
468        return helpOpt;
469    }
470
471    protected static String addOutputToFileOption(Options options) {
472        String outputToFileOpt = "outputFile";
473        options.addOption("o", outputToFileOpt, false, "Write output to file 'goslin-out.tsv' instead of to std out.");
474        return outputToFileOpt;
475    }
476
477    protected static String addGrammarOption(Options options) {
478        String grammarOpt = "grammar";
479        options.addOption("g", grammarOpt, true, "Use the provided grammar explicitly instead of all grammars. Options are: " + Arrays.toString(Grammar.values()));
480        return grammarOpt;
481    }
482
483    private static Map<Grammar, Parser<LipidAdduct>> loadParsers() {
484        if(parsers.isEmpty()) {
485            KnownFunctionalGroups kfg = new KnownFunctionalGroups();
486            for (Grammar grammar : Grammar.values()) {
487                switch (grammar) {
488                    case FATTY_ACID ->
489                        parsers.put(grammar, new FattyAcidParser(kfg));
490                    case GOSLIN ->
491                        parsers.put(grammar, new GoslinParser(kfg));
492                    case HMDB ->
493                        parsers.put(grammar, new HmdbParser(kfg));
494                    case LIPIDMAPS ->
495                        parsers.put(grammar, new LipidMapsParser(kfg));
496                    case SHORTHAND2020 ->
497                        parsers.put(grammar, new ShorthandParser(kfg));
498                    case SWISSLIPIDS ->
499                        parsers.put(grammar, new SwissLipidsParser(kfg));
500                    case GOSLIN_FRAGMENTS -> {
501                    }
502                    case NONE -> {
503                    }
504                }
505            }
506        }
507        return parsers;
508    }
509
510}
